scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: Hannah Joan
scrape.text: This book reinforces the fact that a good book, a great book, does not have to have characters that are 'good'. This book is central on the fact that as the night goes on, so does the awareness of the fact that none of these characters are good. There are bad people in the world, who live in ambiguity and end in it as well.
